General.Name: Ouster, Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Ouster, Inc. provides lidar sensors for the automotive, industrial, robotics, and smart infrastructure industries in the Americas, the Asia-Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. Its products include high-resolution scanning and solid-state digital lidar sensors, analog lidar sensors, and software solutions. The company offers Ouster Sensor, a scanning sensor; and Digital Flash, a solid-state flash sensor. It also provides surround-view lidar sensors, which include Ouster Gemini, a perception platform for smart infrastructure deployments; and BlueCity, a Gemini-powered solution for traffic operations, planning, and safety. Ouster, Inc. is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 350 Treat Avenue, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94110
